settings.heading: OUR STORY
settings.text: CALIFORNIA-BASED COMPANY. WE STARTED IN SACRAMENTO IN 2012, OPENING WITH OUR FIRST BARBERSHOP IN 2015. FIVE YEARS LATER - WE’RE CREATING EXPERIENCES IN TWO CITIES, WITH THREE BARBER STUDIOS AND A TEAM OF BARBERS. EXPANDING ONLINE - OUR TEN IDEA-MAKERS CARRY OUR VISION TO THE PIXELATED STRATOSPHERE..

settings.question: How long will it take to receive a reply to my email?
settings.answer: We usually reply within 24hrs. EXCLUDING holidays and weekends when office is closed.

settings.question: How long does shipping and processing take?
settings.answer:
Paid orders will be processed and shipped within 24-48 hours of payment EXCLUDING holidays and weekends. Shipping within the United States is handled via UPS and takes on average 1-2 business days for processing and 3-4 business days for shipping. Priority Mail option on average take 2-3 days once order is processed and shipped.


International shipping is handled via UPS International and takes anywhere from 6-10 business days.

settings.question: How can I get my tracking number for my package?
settings.answer: You will receive a shipping confirmation email with tracking no. once your package has been shipped. Check the email used during checkout. Remember to check the following day in the afternoon. If for some reason you can't find it, shoot us an email and we will email it back to you.

settings.question: Can I send in my blades or clippers for service?
settings.answer: We apologize, but we currently do not except any outside products for any kind of service.

settings.question: What is the return policy?
settings.answer:
All sales are final on DVD's.
All other items unused and unopened may be returned or exchanged within 14 days of purchase date.
*Defected items may be returned for full refund or new replaced item within 14 days

settings.question: Will the 1 Min. Blade Modifier work with Wahl razor edge liners?
settings.answer: Yes, they work with Wahl Razor Edge Liners.

settings.question: Do you have to swipe the 1 Min. Blade Modifier for one whole minute to get it sharpened?
settings.answer: No, you do not.

settings.question: I got my blades too sharp and now they nick, what should I do?
settings.answer: Try re-gapping the blade and make sure the blades are even.

settings.question: Where can I find the instructions to use The Rich Barber products??
settings.answer: There are three options to retrieve The Rich Barber product instructional manuals. Every product comes with an instructional manual within the product packaging. You can also retrieve instructions on this page, to the left. And lastly, you can see video instructions on The Rich Barber Youtube Channel.

settings.question: I have a Bevel Trimmer. How do I sharpen the Bevel blade on the 1 Min. Blade Modifier?
settings.answer: Remove the blade from the Bevel Trimmer, like you would with Andis or Wahl Trimmers - and sharpen back and forth until fully modified.

settings.question: Is it possible to replace its battery on the Flash Comb?
settings.answer: On the current Flash Comb design, no you cannot remove the battery.

settings.question: Since the Flash Comb is advertised for both left and right-handed users, how can left-handed individuals use this?
settings.answer: Simply flip the flash comb.

settings.question: Can of the 10 Sec. Blade Setters fit Wahl Wide T Blades or the Bevel T-Blade?
settings.answer: No, they do not.

settings.question: Will the 10 Sec. Blade Setter help make your trimmers give a sharp, crispier line-up?
settings.answer: In combination with the 1 Min. Blade Modifier, yes - first you need to have a modified blade in order to have a sharpened tool. Secondly, you your blades will need to be set in order to have more control in creating a sharper, crispier line-up.

settings.question: Does the 10 Sec. Blade Setters help set the blade to being zero gaped?
settings.answer: Yes, they were designed to help the blade with a zero-gap.

settings.question: How do I completely dry the N'Hance Application Pump?
settings.answer: After cleaning your N'Hance application pump, simply let it sit unassembled for 24 hours in both pieces to allow for it to completely be dry.

settings.question: Are the N'Hance Hair Fibers supposed to stick? If so, how can I make them stick?
settings.answer: The fibers will attach to hair naturally, but for extra hold, use a light amount of the N'Hance Hold Spray to help it stick longer.

settings.question: How do you take off the top of the N'Hance Hair Fibers with the holes?
settings.answer:
Hold the N'Hance Hair Fibers bottle close to your body. You will have to squeeze and twist the top in an upward motion, while
you twist the bottom in the opposite direction. Just be careful not to pull the top up with too
much force and end up spilling the fibers.

settings.question: Do you apply the N'Hance Hold Spray prior to fiber application or after?
settings.answer: You can do it either way. If you're looking for super strong, all day hold do it before and after for full longevity.

settings.question: I bought the Pro Barber Tools Set model that is compatible with the Andis Styliner ii and I would like to know if this product will still help me to modify the GTX blade?
settings.answer:
The blade modifier will work to modify the GTX blade but the blade setter would not be
compatible. You would want to buy and use our gold blade setter which is compatible with the GTX
blade.

settings.question: Does the Andis Slimline Pro work for the Pro ii and/or the Andis Pivot Pro?
settings.answer: Yes, it works with both.

settings.question: Are the 10 Sec. Blade Setters compatible with the Wahl detailer cordless, Oyster Grooming Blades, or the Wahl 5 Star Blade/Edgers?
settings.answer: No, none of The Rich Barber Blade Setters are compatible with these.

settings.question: Does The Rich Barber Method System Book also work for beginners?
settings.answer: Yes, this book was written and created for beginners. It was also written for entrepreneurs who aren't barbers.

settings.question: How long will it take for one to perfect The Rich Barber Method?
settings.answer: Once you read the book, complete the course and start implementing all of the teachings from The Rich Barber Method System consistently, you will be able to perfect the system. But you can only do this, if you study it and practice all of the structural suggestions every day, all day.

settings.question: Can the N'Hance Hold Spray be used with hair gel?
settings.answer: Yes, it's better to use it prior to applying other hair product.

settings.question: Does the N'Hance Hold Spray create dandruff?
settings.answer: No, the N'Hance Hold Spray does not dry out skin. Dandruff is typically caused by people who suffer from too oily to too dry scalp skin. If you use the Pro Rich Shampoo and Conditioner, you can help prevent dry or too oily of a scalp. The Pro Rich Conditioner promotes a moisturized, healthy scalp, and if you use it in combination with the N'Hance Hold Spray, your scalp will be healthy and strong enough to resist dandruff.

settings.question: How do you properly clean the Application Cards after each use?
settings.answer: Simply use alcohol-based soap and water to clean the Application Cards. Once cleaned, use a dry towel to wipe off and reuse.

settings.question: Can the 360 Barber Cape be washed using warm water?
settings.answer: Clean the 360 Barber Cape with cold water, and on tumble dry low. The wash instructions for this cape are on a tag attached to the product.

settings.question: Does the color of the Grooming Towels bleed onto other garments when washed together?
settings.answer: No. But with all black garments, you should wash with dark colors.

settings.question: How many times a day should I apply the Pro Rich Beard Oil?
settings.answer: You can apply The Rich Barber Pro Rich Beard Oil, 1 to 2 times a day for full effect. Apply after you shower so your beard hair can fully absorb the nutrients.

settings.question: Are The Rich Barber clothing garments unisex?
settings.answer: Yes, both men and women can both wear our clothing. The garments are sized larger, so women..please size down one size for a better fit.

settings.question: Does The Rich Barber Hand Sanitizer dry the skin out?
settings.answer: No, The Rich Barber Hand Sanitizer was formulated to not be like other hand sanitizers. Formulated with castor oil (a super natural moisturizing plant oil) that not only keeps your hands soft, but also works as it's own cleaning agent.

settings.question: What makes the Pro Rich Shampoo and Conditioner different from other shampoos and conditioners on the market?
settings.answer: The Pro Rich Shampoo and Conditioner isn't a generic cleansing shampoo and conditioner. It's a DHT-Blocking Shampoo and Conditioner, formulated to help men combat hair lose and can prevent the hormone's harmful effects on your scalp's follicles, resulting in less hair loss. But again, that's not all this set can do for you. They both were also designed to prevent acne on the scalp and at the hairline. And it was designed with ingredients that help men with more texturized hair, unlike traditional mainstream products which are formulated for caucasian men with straight hair. Ingredients such as: jojoba oil, castor oil, peppermint, saw palmetto, tea tree, algae, coconut oil, argan oil and shea butter.

settings.custom_html: WHAT PEOPLE SAY

settings.question: Will it work with the Wahl razor edge liners?
settings.answer: Yes, it will work with Wahl edge liners.

settings.question: Do I have to swipe the blade for a full minute to sharpen it?
settings.answer: No, you do not. Swipe the blade until you achieve the desired results.

settings.question: My blade is nicking - what should I do?
settings.answer: Nicking is usually caused by improper blade alignment. First, re-gap the blade to ensure that blades are even. If not, check out our Blade Setter, which was designed to properly align blades.

settings.question: Where can I find instructions on how to use this product?
settings.answer: Instructions on how to use the Blade Modifier can be found on our FAQ page. Here is a link.

settings.question: I have a Bevel Trimmer - how do I sharpen a Bevel blade using the Blade Modifier?
settings.answer: Lorem Ipsum

settings.question: Is it possible to replace the FlashComb battery?
settings.answer: Yes, it is.

settings.question: Is it compatible for both left and right-handed users?
settings.answer: Yes. Flip the removable light mechanism to the other side based on need.

settings.question: Do you offer the FlashComb in other colors?
settings.answer: At this moment, this product is only available in black.

settings.heading: HOW TO USE
settings.paragraph: The ultimate tool for your home or professional barber kit. The Rich Barber 1 Min. Blade Modifier can be used to sharpen blades up to 15-20 times. It contains a diamond metal sharpening stone that’s marked with guidelines to let you transform an edge perfectly without the risk of over-sharpening. Simply swipe blade back and forth until sharpened fully. Compatible with all major-brand professional trimmer blades including Andis, Wahl, Oster, BaByliss, and others.
settings.desc1: CLIPPERS WILL HIT EXACT EVERY TIME WITH FULLY SHARPENED BLADES
settings.desc2: 60 SECONDS TO PERFECTLY MODIFIED BLADES, DESIGNED FOR MAX PERFECTION
settings.desc3: HIGH PERFORMANCE DESIGN WITH A SHARPENING STONE MADE FROM PREMIUM DIAMOND METAL

settings.heading: HOW TO USE
settings.paragraph: The ultimate alignment tool. First, loosen the screws that are on your blade. Remove top piece fully. Take the 10 Sec. Blade Setter, whichever compatible type you purchased, and snap your blade within the open frame. If it's positioned correctly, it will snap right into place. Now take the top piece and place back onto blade in original position, centered. Firmly holding down, use a screwdriver and screw in the two screws. Once tightened, simply snap the blade out of the setter.  Aligns blades in 10 seconds or less.
settings.desc1: TOTAL ALIGNMENT CONTROL, CLIPPERS WILL HIT EXACT EVERY TIME YOU ALIGN BLADES
settings.desc2: THE AUTOMATIC 0 GAP ALIGNMENT TOOL, FOR PERFECTLY CALCULATED PRECISION
settings.desc3: ALIGNING BLADES IN 10 SECONDS, ALLOWING FOR SHARPER LINE-UPS & CLEANER FADES

settings.question: Can any of the Blade Setters fit Wahl Wide T-Blades?
settings.answer: Not at this moment. Stay tuned for new releases.

settings.question: Why is the Blade Setter for the Slimline Pro black when the insert says the Blade Setter compatible with the Slimeline Pro should be white?
settings.answer: The line strip below the logo should be white for the Blade Setter compatible with the Slimline Pro. If your line strip is black, then the Blade Setter you have is for the Andis T-Outliner and Outliner II (Blade Setter, Black). If you ordered the wrong one, please send our Support Desk a message (support@therichbarber.com) and we’ll issue a replacement with the correct Blade Setter.

settings.question: Can any of the Blade Setters work with the Bevel T-Blade Trimmer?
settings.answer: At this moment, we do not offer a Blade Setter that is compatible with the Bevel T-Blade Trimmer. Subscribe to our newsletter for updates on new releases.

settings.question: Why does it not fit well?
settings.answer: Lorem Ipsum

settings.question: What material is the Blade Setters made of? Is it sturdy?
settings.answer: Our Blade Setters are made of plastic, but they are sturdy.

settings.question: Will the Blade Setters provide a crisp and sharp line?
settings.answer: Yes, setting the blade correctly is the best way to achieve a crisp and sharp line.

settings.question: Does it set the blade to "zero gap"?
settings.answer: Yes, it does. Setting the blade to zero gap helps achieve sharper lines, closer shaves, and overall better performance without biting the skin.

settings.question: Is it better to set the blades using a mirror?
settings.answer: No, it is not. Using the mirror to set the blade is an outdated technique.

settings.heading: HOW TO USE
settings.paragraph: The ultimate hair loss tool that enhances your hair without expensive, unpredictable surgery. The Rich Barber Hair Fibers are professionally formulated to bond naturally to your existing hair giving you a look that will last all day, and unnoticeably. Simply sprinkle on desired location for a fuller appearance. Initially start lightly, do not over apply so you maintain a natural finish. Use the application pump (not included) for an airbrush finish. Three-month supply.
settings.desc1: Masks receding hairlines, fill in thin spots and conceal grays
settings.desc2: Protein-rich ingredient that bonds & absorbs for a fuller, glossier finish
settings.desc3: Lightweight formulation that naturally sticks to hair srands unnoticeably

settings.question: Are the hair fibers supposed to stick? If not, how can I make them stick?
settings.answer: Yes, the Hair Fibers are supposed to naturally bind to your hair. For extra hold, use a light amount of our N'Hance Hold Spray or some pomade.

settings.question: How do you remove the perforated cap (cap with holes)?
settings.answer: Hold the bottle close to your body and squeeze while twisting the cap in an upward motion, while twisting the bottom in a downwards direction. Refrain from pulling the cap upwards with too much force and spilling the inside contents.

settings.question: Do you apply the hold spray prior to applying the hair fibers or after applying the hair fibers?
settings.answer: It is recommended to apply the hold spray after applying the hair building fibers. You can apply them after, but it isn't recommended.

settings.heading: HOW TO USE
settings.paragraph: The ultimate jet-setting barber light source. The detachable LED light design allows for the Flash Comb to be both 100% waterproof and rinsable. This one-of-a-kind design gives the freedom of use in any way you choose, whether it's with dry or wet hair. The perfect haircut often requires some deft maneuvering between your hands. The Flash Comb works for barbers and stylists who are right and left handed. Just flip the detachable LED light and use as you choose. Simply press the button, and your on your way to absolute precision.
settings.desc1: PROVIDES GREATER VISIBILITY ON LOW-LIGHT HAIRCUTTING ENVIRONMENTS
settings.desc2: CREATE, CUT & SHAVE ANY HAIR TEXTURE AND DENSITY, WITH THE WIDE & FINE COMB TEETH
settings.desc3: CRISPIER LINES, STRONGER DETAILS AND CLEANER FADES WITH UP-CLOSE EXACTNESS

settings.heading: HOW TO USE
settings.paragraph: The ultimate barber tools duo, The Pro Barber Tools Set. If your blades are dull, use the 1 Min. Blade Modifier; which contains a diamond metal sharpening stone that’s marked with guidelines which allow you to transform an edge perfectly without the risk of over-sharpening. Simply swipe blade back and forth until sharpened fully. When you need to set your blades; take the 10 Sec. Blade Setter, and snap blade into place. Then loosen the set of screws, gently push moving blade forward into place and tighten the screws.
settings.desc1: Total alignment control, allowing clippers to hit exact every time
settings.desc2: Made with diamond metal precision, allowing for absolute precision
settings.desc3: Seconds to perfectly aligned and modified blades, simplifying the process

settings.heading: HOW TO USE
settings.paragraph: The ultimate hair shaping and line-up tool. Accomplish precision finishes at home, or on a client with The Rich Barber Razor Holder. Our professional razor holder (blades not included) allows you to customize your client’s hair with a high quality fully expansive razor holder, with a 360 degree motion. A lightweight design that allows you to fully detail the hairline or line up the beard with no hassle or added weight. Simply take your blade and snap within the razor holder slit.
settings.desc1: DESIGNED TO SIMPLIFY THE AT HOME EXPERIENCE, BY AN INDUSTRY PROFESSIONAL
settings.desc2: USE THE RAZOR HOLDER TO GET CLOSER DETAIL WORK, LIKE LINE-UPS
settings.desc3: DESIGNED TO SIMPLIFY THE AT HOME EXPERIENCE, BY AN INDUSTRY PROFESSIONAL

settings.heading: HOW TO USE
settings.paragraph: The ultimate hair enhancement set that perfects details, conceals hair loss, or sharpens hairline. The N'Hance Pro Barber Kit II delivers a precise look while maximizing the impact of your cut. For a 24-hour hold, apply the N'Hance Hair Fibers to the desired location, then apply the Style Hold Spray. Use the application card when applying the N'Hance Hair Fibers on the hairline for a sharper hairline (bend for detailing, cover if aligning). For a natural finish, do not over-apply.
settings.desc1: ALL THE TOOLS FOR PRECISE DETAILS, FILLS, AND TOUCH UPS
settings.desc2: KERATIN-INFUSED HAIR FIBERS AND LIGHTWEIGHT HOLD SPRAY KEEPS HAIR HEALTHY
settings.desc3: APPLICATION PUMP EVENLY DISTRIBUTION HAIR FIBERS FOR A NATURAL LOOK

settings.question: DO I APPLY THE HAIR FIBERS BEFORE OR AFTER HOLD SPRAY?
settings.answer: YOU CAN APPLY THE HOLD SPRAY BEFORE OR AFTER HAIR FIBERS. FOR BEST RESULTS, APPLY THE HOLD SPRAY AFTER THE HAIR FIBERS.

settings.question: HOW DO I INSTALL THE APPLICATION PUMP ONTO THE HAIR FIBERS BOTTLE?
settings.answer: TWIST OFF THE CAP FROM THE HAIR FIBERS BOTTLE, GENTLY REMOVE THE PREFORATED CAP (CAP WITH HOLES) FROM THE HAIR FIBERS BOTTLE, TWIST ON THE APPLICATION PUMP ONTO THE HAIR FIBERS BOTTLE. FOR A VIDEO DEMONSTRATION, CLICK HERE.

settings.question: IS THE HAIR FIBERS A LIQUID OR POWDER?
settings.answer: THE HAIR FIBERS ARE DESIGNED AS A POWDER FOR A MORE NATURAL LOOK.

settings.question: WILL THE HAIR FIBERS BLEED WHEN I SWEAT?
settings.answer: THE HAIR FIBERS WILL REMAIN LOCKED ONTO YOUR HAIR WITH THE USE OF THE HOLD SPRAY. IT WILL REMAIN LOCKED ONTO YOUR HAIR THROUGH LIGHT TO MODERATE SWEATING.

settings.question: HOW LONG DOES THE HAIR FIBERS STAY IN MY HAIR?
settings.answer: THE HAIR FIBERS WILL REMAIN IN YOUR HAIR FOR UP TO 24 HOURS WITH THE USE OF HOLD SPRAY.

settings.question: HOW LONG WILL THE HAIR FIBERS & HOLD SPRAY LAST WITH DAILY USE?
settings.answer: THEY WILL LAST BETWEEN 1 MONTH TO 3 MONTHS DEPENDING ON QUANTITY USED PER APPLICATION.

settings.heading: HOW TO USE
settings.paragraph: The ultimate beginner's kit that conceals, perfects and enhances to any hair or hairline. The N'Hance Pro Barber Kit I delivers an elevated look while maximizing the impact of your overall appearance. For precision, take the application card, (bend if detailing and cover if aligning) to the desired application area. While holding the card, lightly apply the Hair Fibers, using the Application Pump for an airbrush finish. Lightly pump and re-apply for your desired finish. Do not over apply, as you want a natural finished effect.
settings.desc1: The beginners kit to hide graying, hair thinning and receding hairlines
settings.desc2: Cover-up hair loss, define line-ups, and detail with precision
settings.desc3: DESIGNED TO SIMPLIFY THE AT HOME EXPERIENCE, BY AN INDUSTRY PROFESSIONAL

settings.question: HOW DO I COMPLETELY DRY THE APPLICATION PUMP?
settings.answer: SINCE THE HAIR FIBERS ARE A POWDER, THE APPLICATION PUMP DOES NOT NEED TO BE WASHED.

settings.question: HOW DO I INSTALL THE APPLICATION PUMP?
settings.answer: TWIST OFF THE CAP FROM THE HAIR FIBERS BOTTLE, GENTLY REMOVE THE PREFORATED CAP (CAP WITH HOLES) FROM THE HAIR FIBERS BOTTLE, TWIST ON THE APPLICATION PUMP ONTO THE HAIR FIBERS BOTTLE. FOR A VIDEO DEMONSTRATION, CLICK HERE.

settings.question: IS THE HAIR FIBERS A LIQUID OR POWDER?
settings.answer: THE HAIR FIBERS ARE DESIGNED AS A POWDER FOR A MORE NATURAL LOOK.

settings.question: WILL THE HAIR FIBERS BLEED WHEN I SWEAT?
settings.answer: RARELY, BUT FOR MAXIMUM HOLD APPLY THE HOLD SPRAY AFTER YOU APPLY THE HAIR FIBERS. CHECK OUT THE N'HANCE PRO KIT 2 FOR A SET THAT INCLUDES A HOLD SPRAY.

settings.question: HOW LONG DOES THE HAIR FIBERS LAST WITH DAILY USE?
settings.answer: THE HAIR FIBERS WILL LAST BETWEEN 1 MONTH TO 3 MONTHS DEPENDING ON QUANTITY USED PER APPLICATION.

settings.heading: HOW TO USE
settings.paragraph: The ultimate strong style hold spray. The Rich Barber N'Hance Hold Spray was formulated for all day long-lasting stay. A strong adhesion designed to hold in the N'Hance Hair Fibers for 24 hours, even when working or working out. Simply hold the bottle 8-10 inches away from hair and use in short, easy sprays. For long lasting stay use before and after hair fibers application. May be reapplied, if needed. Use with application card to keep product out of eyes, and for a more lined edge or detail. 2 month supply.
settings.desc1: Formulated to keep fibers in place for all day stay & prevent natural shedding
settings.desc2: Designed to keep up with everyday activities with its sweat-resistant formula
settings.desc3: Formulated to fully cover and contain hair fibers without weighing heavy

settings.heading: HOW TO USE
settings.paragraph: The ultimate shaping tool for hair and beards. The Rich Barber N'Hance Application cards were designed to simplify the designer's experience when applying the N'Hance Hair Fibers. Simply bend the application card in the desired shape around the beard line (or hair line). Tilt card, while holding card against the face or head when applying the fibers or hold spray. Do not apply with pressure. Use card only when aligning the edges, filling in or protecting the face and eyes. Clean after each use.
settings.desc1: Visible precision, with one clear side, allows for outcome manipulation
settings.desc2: Bendable card allows user to shape hair & beard line-ups, as well as complex details
settings.desc3: Assists application of N'Hance Fibers with lining, detailing & protection

settings.heading: HOW TO USE
settings.paragraph: The ultimate airbrush effect. The Rich Barber N'hance Application Pump was designed to create a realistic application without looking fake. The ideal application method is to use with the N'Hance Hair Fibers. After removing the lid/grated cork top piece from the hair fibers bottle, which twisting and pulling upwards. Take the application pump and simply twist the base onto the open hair fibers bottle.Once attached, press the pump down to begin use. Best technique is for lines/edges application of the beard and hairline.
settings.desc1: Properly control usage of hair fibers with a hands on application
settings.desc2: Ideal for detailing, fading or filling in with a an airbrush application
settings.desc3: Natural looking application with a flawless, realistic finish

settings.question: How do I completely dry the application pump?
settings.answer: The application pump does not need to be washed.

settings.heading: HOW TO USE
settings.paragraph: The superior name to wipe and protect your face in. The Rich Barber Hand Towel was designed with materials from nature, for fast absorption and quick drying. The ideal styling aid, made with 100% cotton. Use as an at-home grooming tool, as a barber, for hair styling and dying or even just drying your hands. Simply through in the washer when dirty with like-colors and air dry (for max softness) or on tumble dry low to maintain it's cotton structure.
settings.desc1: Seconds to full absorption for styling, drying or dying the hair
settings.desc2: Quick drying technology, made with 100% nature sourced materials
settings.desc3: Washer safe with hard to fade dyes & heat-resistant material for long-lasting use

settings.heading: HOW TO USE
settings.paragraph: The superior name to wrap your clients in. The Rich Barber 360 Barber Cape was designed to fit all body sizes and neck types; with a stretch-neck clip-on feature this allows each client to be comfortably wrapped in a water and debris resistant securing cape. Simply wrap around your client, clip each clip at your customized format and you're ready to start cutting. Throw in the washer for a quick wash with like colors. Air dry to maximize the longevity of The Rich Barber logo.
settings.desc1: DESIGNED TO SIMPLIFY THE AT HOME EXPERIENCE, BY AN INDUSTRY PROFESSIONAL
settings.desc2: Designed with non-stick materials that allow debris and hair to simply fall off
settings.desc3: 100% total protection from water, styling products and hair

settings.heading: WHY IT WORKS
settings.paragraph: The ultimate jet-setter's carry-on. Cleanliness is the key to making any kind of deal. The Rich Barber Hand Sanitizer was designed for anyone on the go that is looking for both industry standard and natural forms of sanitary cleanliness. Formulated with Castor Oil and Alcohol to both target and clean your hands while also giving them ultra hydration. Simply open, pour a few drops and lather into hands. Designed for travel at 1.7 ounces, simply throw in your carry-on bag and you're ready to meet your next client.
settings.desc1: Formulated with alcohol to maximize disinfection, while castor oil fully moisturizes
settings.desc2: Designed to not only just clean, but to keep your hands silky soft
settings.desc3: With less than 7 ingredients, this is a rare naturally formulated hand sanitizer

settings.heading: HOW IT WORKS
settings.paragraph: The ultimate fresh-smelling anti-hair loss shampoo for men. The Rich Barber Pro Rich Shampoo was designed to combat male hormonal hair loss caused by DHT; while also fighting hairline acne, dry scalp, slow hair/follicle growth, and greasy/dirty hair. Formulated with natural ingredients like Saw Palmetto, a plant-based ingredient that reverses male hormonal hair loss caused by producing too much testosterone. (See more ingredients listed in the description). Ideal for the man looking to restore his full hair health, from the scalp to the follicles to the tips. Use with the Pro Rich Men's Conditioner for maximum results.
settings.desc1: TOTAL HAIR LOSS CAUSED BY DHT HORMONES, WHICH MINIATURIZE & MINIMIZE FOLLICLES
settings.desc2: FULLY USING DHT BLOCKERS, HAIR BEGINS TO REGROW, FOLLICLES GET LONGER & FULLER
settings.desc3: AFTER USING THE PRO RICH Shampoo, ORIGINATING BACK TO THICKER, TERMINAL HAIR

settings.heading: HOW IT WORKS
settings.paragraph: The ultimate fresh-smelling pro-hair thickening conditioner for men. The Rich Barber Pro Rich Conditioner was designed to combat male hormonal hair loss caused by DHT; while also stimulating follicle growth/strength, nourishing the scalp and reducing skin redness, promoting hair thickness by preventing breakage and adding luster and shine. Formulated with natural ingredients like Saw Palmetto, a plant-based ingredient that reverses male hormonal hair loss caused by producing too much testosterone. (See more ingredients listed in the description). Ideal for the man looking to restore his full hair health, from the scalp to the follicles to the tips. Use with the Pro Rich Men's Shampoo for maximum results.
settings.desc1: Total hair loss caused by DHT hormones, which miniaturize & minimize follicles
settings.desc2: Fully using DHT blockers, hair begins to regrow, follicles get longer & fuller
settings.desc3: After using The Pro Rich Conditioner, originating back to thicker, terminal hair

settings.heading: HOW IT WORKS
settings.paragraph: The ultimate fresh-smelling pro hair rejuvenation set for men. The Rich Barber Pro Rich Shampoo and Conditioner was designed to combat male hormonal hair loss caused by DHT; while also fighting hairline acne, dry scalp, slow hair/follicle growth, and greasy/dirty hair. While also, stimulating follicle growth/strength, nourishing the scalp and reducing skin redness, promoting hair thickness by preventing breakage and adding luster and shine. Formulated with natural ingredients like Saw Palmetto, a plant-based ingredient that reverses male hormonal hair loss caused by producing too much testosterone. (See more ingredients listed in the description). Ideal for the man looking to restore his full hair health, from the scalp to the follicles to the tips. 3 Month Supply.
settings.desc1: TOTAL HAIR LOSS CAUSED BY DHT HORMONES, WHICH MINIATURIZE & MINIMIZE FOLLICLES
settings.desc2: FULLY USING DHT BLOCKERS, HAIR BEGINS TO REGROW, FOLLICLES GET LONGER & FULLER
settings.desc3: AFTER USING THE PRO RICH Set, ORIGINATING BACK TO THICKER, TERMINAL HAIR

settings.heading: WHY IT WORKS
settings.paragraph: The ultimate beard strengthening secret for men. The Rich Barber Pro Rich Beard Oil was designed to enhance and strengthen the beard and 'stache. Formulated with natural and innovative ingredients like Sweet Almond Oil that stimulates beard growth, eliminates dandruff, reduces skin inflammation while leaving your beard silky soft. Ideal for the man looking to restore and maintain his beard and stache to full health, from the follicles to the tips. Simply use a dime size amount and lather into beard 1-2 times a day for maximum results.
settings.desc1: Stimulates beard growth, eliminates dandruff & reduces skin inflammation
settings.desc2: Moisturizes your skin, while protecting your beard from everyday damage.
settings.desc3: Promotes circulation for follicle growth, while adding luster shine & softness

settings.heading: ADD TO CART TO QUALIFY FOR FREE SHIPPING

settings.title: OUR PURPOSE
settings.info: The Rich Barber is an ideology - a self-made mindset. Built on newness. Created by community. Envisioned by inspiration. We create ground-breaking tools and philosophies that streamline both time and work, for a more refined outcome. Designed for barbers, by barbers. We’re not just imagining a more abundant future, we’re building the framework to a more impactful vision. Made for the customer, destined for the world.

settings.title: PRODUCT INNOVATION
settings.info: WE ONLY SELL PRODUCTS THAT OUR CEO HAS DESIGNED. PATENTED, BRAND-MADE TOOLS INVENTED BY AN INDUSTRY PROFESSIONAL. WE MAKE NO COMPRIMISES WHEN IT COMES TO QUALITY.

settings.title: BY BARBERS, FOR EVERYONE
settings.info: OUR PRODUCTS HAVE AN IMPACT ON YOUR WAY OF LIVING, FROM BEGINNING TO THE END OF THE DAY. OUR APPROACH TO OUR PRODUCTS IS WE COLLECT WHAT YOU NEED IN ORDER TO START A CLEANER...CRISPER YOU, EACH AND EVERY DAY. BY BARBERS, FOR EVERYONE.

settings.title: REVOLUTIONARY PERSPECTIVE
settings.info: AN ENTIRE BRAND BUILT ON A VARIOUS PHILOSOPHIES, FROM NEW AGE THINKING TO PRODUCT AND LIFESTYLE EDUCATION. WE TEACH, MOTIVATE AND EDUCATE THOSE WHO CRAVE A RICHER PERSPECTIVE.

settings.title: OUR PRODUCTS
settings.info: we provide industry-demanded barber tools designed for everyone, proven hair/beard care products with carefully selected ingredients and the education that changes your life.

settings.info_q1: WE BELIEVE IN A THOUGHT-PROVOKING FORCE.
settings.info_q2:
WE BELIEVE IN HAVING GUTS.
THE IMPULSE FOR SOMETHING NEW, HAS LONG-LASTING EFFECTS. WE DON’T JUST SELL ANY PRODUCT, WE CREATE PURPOSEFUL PRODUCTS WITH INNOVATIVE INGREDIENTS AND MATERIALS THAT SIMPLIFY YOUR EXPERIENCES WITH PROFOUND IMPACT(S).
settings.story_text: CALIFORNIA-BASED COMPANY. WE STARTED IN SACRAMENTO IN 2012, OPENING WITH OUR FIRST BARBERSHOP IN 2015. FIVE YEARS LATER - WE’RE CREATING EXPERIENCES IN TWO CITIES, WITH THREE BARBER STUDIOS AND A TEAM OF BARBERS. EXPANDING ONLINE - OUR TEN IDEA-MAKERS CARRY OUR VISION TO THE PIXELATED STRATOSPHERE..
settings.story_text1: For the optimist. For the pioneer. For the man that never says “no”, we're designed within and for you. It all starts from a fresh perspective. Rich mindsets, bring rich outcomes.

settings.item_desc: product questions? Issues with an order? Contact us for immediate assistance
looking to expand your store? carry authentic barber tools designed by the rich barber
wanna excel in your barber career? have a portfolio to show off? join our team. apply today.
